```{=html}
<template id="manifesto-text">
<p>This site is a working notebook.</p>
<p>I use it to think in public about climate risk, hazards, and systems under stress.</p>
<p>The notes here are not polished conclusions. They are intermediate objects: models, sketches, assumptions, failures, and partial results.</p>
<p>I am interested in where quantitative methods meet institutional reality — especially where uncertainty, incentives, and governance interact.</p>
<p>I do not treat models as neutral. I treat them as situated tools that encode choices, values, and blind spots.</p>
<p>Clarity matters more than novelty. Reproducibility matters more than rhetoric.</p>
<p>This site is incomplete by design.</p>
</template>

<template id="anti-manifesto-text">
<p>This site is not a portfolio.</p>
<p>It does not claim to have answers. It does not promise insight, impact, or innovation.</p>
<p>There is no thought leadership here. No frameworks. No "key takeaways."</p>
<p>I am not trying to build an audience, secure funding, or demonstrate competence.</p>
<p>The work here is not optimised for legibility. It is not designed to reassure.</p>
<p>If something looks unfinished, it probably is. If something looks wrong, it might be.</p>
<p>This site rejects polish as a proxy for rigour.</p>
</template>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const body = document.getElementById('manifesto-body');
  const title = document.getElementById('manifesto-title');
  const switchBtn = document.getElementById('manifesto-switch');
  const manifestoTemplate = document.getElementById('manifesto-text');
  const antiTemplate = document.getElementById('anti-manifesto-text');
  
  if (!body || !title || !switchBtn || !manifestoTemplate || !antiTemplate) {
    return;
  }
  
  let currentState = 'manifesto';
  
  function getTheme() {
    const bsTheme = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-bs-theme');
    if (bsTheme) return bsTheme;
    return window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches ? 'dark' : 'light';
  }
  
  let lastTheme = getTheme();
  
  function setState(state) {
    currentState = state;
    if (state === 'manifesto') {
      body.innerHTML = manifestoTemplate.innerHTML;
      title.textContent = 'Manifesto';
      switchBtn.classList.remove('anti-active');
    } else {
      body.innerHTML = antiTemplate.innerHTML;
      title.textContent = 'Anti-Manifesto';
      switchBtn.classList.add('anti-active');
    }
  }
  
  function initFromTheme() {
    const theme = getTheme();
    setState(theme === 'dark' ? 'anti' : 'manifesto');
  }
  
  initFromTheme();
  
  switchBtn.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    e.stopPropagation();
    setState(currentState === 'manifesto' ? 'anti' : 'manifesto');
  });
  
  const observer = new MutationObserver(function() {
    const currentTheme = getTheme();
    if (currentTheme !== lastTheme) {
      lastTheme = currentTheme;
      initFromTheme();
    }
  });
  
  observer.observe(document.documentElement, { 
    attributes: true, 
    attributeFilter: ['data-bs-theme'] 
  });
  
  window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').addEventListener('change', function() {
    const currentTheme = getTheme();
    if (currentTheme !== lastTheme) {
      lastTheme = currentTheme;
      initFromTheme();
    }
  });
});
</script>
```

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Featured content configuration
  // Manually specify featured items by path
  const featuredItems = [
    { href: '/notes/risk-series-1.html', title: 'Risk Modelling Part 1: Foundations', description: 'Introduction to risk modelling concepts and frameworks for climate contexts.', type: 'note' },
    { href: '/models/climate-extremes-explorer.html', title: 'Climate Extremes Explorer', description: 'Interactive analysis of climate extremes using synthetic data. Demonstrates methods for identifying and analyzing extreme events.', type: 'model' },
    { href: '/notes/risk-series-2.html', title: 'Risk Modelling Part 2: Data', description: 'Data sources and considerations for climate risk modelling.', type: 'note' },
    { href: '/models/heatwave-prices-de-lu.html', title: 'Heatwaves and Day-Ahead Prices', description: 'Analysis of electricity prices during heatwave events in Germany-Luxembourg.', type: 'model' }
  ];

  const container = document.getElementById('featured-content-container');
  if (!container) return;

  let currentIndex = 0;

  // Create carousel structure
  const carousel = document.createElement('div');
  carousel.className = 'featured-content-carousel';

  // Create cards container
  const cardsContainer = document.createElement('div');
  cardsContainer.className = 'featured-content-cards';

  featuredItems.forEach((item, index) => {
    const card = document.createElement('div');
    card.className = `featured-content-card featured-${item.type} ${index === 0 ? 'active' : ''}`;
    
    const typeLabel = item.type === 'note' ? 'Note' : item.type === 'model' ? 'Model' : 'Project';
    
    card.innerHTML = `
      <div class="featured-content-type">${typeLabel}</div>
      <h3 class="featured-content-title">
        <a href="${item.href}">${item.title}</a>
      </h3>
      <p class="featured-content-description">${item.description}</p>
      <a href="${item.href}" class="featured-content-link">Read more →</a>
    `;
    
    cardsContainer.appendChild(card);
  });

  // Create navigation arrows
  const prevBtn = document.createElement('button');
  prevBtn.className = 'featured-content-nav featured-content-prev';
  prevBtn.innerHTML = '←';
  prevBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Previous');
  prevBtn.type = 'button';

  const nextBtn = document.createElement('button');
  nextBtn.className = 'featured-content-nav featured-content-next';
  nextBtn.innerHTML = '→';
  nextBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Next');
  nextBtn.type = 'button';

  // Create dots navigation
  const dotsContainer = document.createElement('div');
  dotsContainer.className = 'featured-content-dots';

  featuredItems.forEach((_, index) => {
    const dot = document.createElement('button');
    dot.className = `featured-content-dot ${index === 0 ? 'active' : ''}`;
    dot.setAttribute('aria-label', `Go to slide ${index + 1}`);
    dot.type = 'button';
    dot.addEventListener('click', () => goToSlide(index));
    dotsContainer.appendChild(dot);
  });

  // Navigation functions
  function goToSlide(index) {
    currentIndex = index;
    updateCarousel();
  }

  function nextSlide() {
    currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % featuredItems.length;
    updateCarousel();
  }

  function prevSlide() {
    currentIndex = (currentIndex - 1 + featuredItems.length) % featuredItems.length;
    updateCarousel();
  }

  function updateCarousel() {
    const cards = cardsContainer.querySelectorAll('.featured-content-card');
    const dots = dotsContainer.querySelectorAll('.featured-content-dot');

    cards.forEach((card, index) => {
      if (index === currentIndex) {
        card.classList.add('active');
      } else {
        card.classList.remove('active');
      }
    });

    dots.forEach((dot, index) => {
      if (index === currentIndex) {
        dot.classList.add('active');
      } else {
        dot.classList.remove('active');
      }
    });
  }

  // Event listeners
  prevBtn.addEventListener('click', prevSlide);
  nextBtn.addEventListener('click', nextSlide);

  // Auto-advance (optional - can be disabled)
  let autoAdvanceInterval;
  function startAutoAdvance() {
    autoAdvanceInterval = setInterval(nextSlide, 5000); // Change every 5 seconds
  }
  function stopAutoAdvance() {
    if (autoAdvanceInterval) {
      clearInterval(autoAdvanceInterval);
    }
  }

  // Pause on hover
  carousel.addEventListener('mouseenter', stopAutoAdvance);
  carousel.addEventListener('mouseleave', startAutoAdvance);

  // Keyboard navigation
  document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
    if (container.contains(document.activeElement) || carousel.contains(document.activeElement)) {
      if (e.key === 'ArrowLeft') {
        e.preventDefault();
        prevSlide();
      } else if (e.key === 'ArrowRight') {
        e.preventDefault();
        nextSlide();
      }
    }
  });

  // Assemble carousel
  carousel.appendChild(prevBtn);
  carousel.appendChild(cardsContainer);
  carousel.appendChild(nextBtn);
  carousel.appendChild(dotsContainer);

  container.innerHTML = '';
  container.appendChild(carousel);

  // Start auto-advance
  startAutoAdvance();
});
</script>
